entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:22 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
